lines.text:
[to cute coed]
I'll meet you in the gymnasium after class. I'll be standing next to the dumbbells. You'll know me, I'll be wearing a hat.

I'm going across the street, men, for a sandwich. Now listen, when the customers come in, give 'em service. Now, this is your first day on the job, so show me that you've got what it takes. Don't be afraid to push those sponges around. Use a little elbow grease!

[getting in Larry's face]
What's the idea?

[to Curly]
I ought to beat your brains in, and I think I will.
Don't ya know it's bad etiquette to reach in front of a person when said person is trying to snag a morsel of food?
Oh, you'll just love it. Mildew has a lovely student body.
Yours wouldn't be so bad either if you took off about twenty pounds!
